roleset.name: maintain peace
roleset.note: PEACEKEEP-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
PEACEKEEPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: peacekeep-v
example.text: Nigeria-1 was looked at *PRO*-1 to peacekeep in Africa.

example.name: peacekeeping-n
example.text: About 200 Danish troops started their peacekeeping in 1993 with the United Nations during the war in Bosnia.
